name: Coalesce
description:
Coalesce is a couch co-op bullet hell where you and another player are bonded together and will be using the power of your bond to shoot down the demons that are corrupting the inner workings of you and your partner’s minds. 

*This game works only with a controller

This is a game created by LTU Game Art and Development students Carissa Vadella (Programmer), Kerragen Dibble, and Gabrielle VanAmberg (Artists).
